title: full/import/path: Aquamacs (GNU emacs 24.3.50.2) reports use of deprecated function
body:
by **jim.fenton**: 
After installing misc/emacs/go-mode.el, loading a go program into emacs causes the
warning:

../../../../../../../usr/local/go/misc/emacs/go-mode.el: `flet' is an obsolete macro (as
of 24.3); use either `cl-flet' or `cl-letf'.

splunge:emacs fenton$ go version
go version go1.2.2 darwin/amd64

Problem reproducible by loading simple hello.go sample program.
